Name: Fomalhaut Flowers
About the game: Go in search of rare flowers and uncover the terrible secret of Fomalhaut. 'Fomalhaut Flowers' - a minimalistic 2D platformer with a side view, in which the player, avoiding enemies and traps, needs to collect all the rare flowers to solve the mystery of one of the planets of Fomalhaut. Game features: - 24 atmospheric levels with a memorable visual style; - Unpredictable behavior of enemies, making each passage unique; - The ability to interact with some objects to solve game problems; - Meditative gameplay; - Unexpected ending of the game. Attention! This game is difficult in terms of passing and is intended for experienced players.
